Detailed Description

Represents a bounded item which can get a audio reference as input.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
 

Enumerator:
ID 

Reimplemented from BoundedItem.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AudioItem::AudioItem (  SharedPtr< AudioReference >  audio_ref  )  [explicit]
 

Parameters:
audio_ref Audio reference which should be displayed. Due to the limitations of the class SharedPtr, it is required to do a recast when passing the parameter (see SharedPtr for details). Example code: 
SharedPtr<PresetAudioReference> preset_audio_ref = AudioPresetStore::GetInstance()->CreateReference("DTMF 1");
SharedPtr<AudioReference> audio_ref = SharedPtr<AudioReference>(&(*preset_audio_ref));
AudioItem audio_item(audio_ref);
editor->InsertItem(audio_item);
Note that the audio item itself gets cloned when the inserting has been successful. This cloned audio item is obtained by the editor and hence the original audio item can get deleted at any time.

AudioItem::~AudioItem (   )  [virtual]
 

Member Function Documentation

AtomItem * AudioItem::Clone (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a flat copy of this object, hence the cloned object and the original object are pointing to the same VCard.
